name: WeightLossMotivator-LoseWeight
0:
”Alexa, ask Weight Loss Motivator for some motivation.”
”Alexa, tell Weight Loss Motivator that I weigh 150 pounds.”
”Alexa, ask Weight Loss Motivator how many pounds I need to lose.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weight loss motivator
des:
Weight Loss Motivator give you the motivation you need to lose those pounds! 
Ask Weight Loss Motivator for some encouragement and it will tell you how many pounds you need to lose to look like a famous celebrity. 
Burn more fat, eat less, and exercise more by keeping your goals in sight. Stay skinny and beautiful!

DISCLAIMER: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
